cohort.description: Array of patient information including tumor and normal fastq files

reference_name.description: The name of the Human reference genome build. Choices are: t2t_mat and t2t_pat

canonical_user_id.description: Your account's AWS canonical user ID. Used to acquire a Sentieon license

n_threads.description: Number of vCPUs to allocate for the task (default: 32)

memory.description: Memory to allocate for the task (default: 64 GiB)
